document_data.caption: A map showing the Dragon Trail in northeast Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Dragon Trail
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dragon Trail''' was a small road that connected with the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Dragons Trail approached Zhentil Keep from the northwest, connecting with the [[Street of Dragons]] at the [[Dragon Gate]].
